attributes.action: Start a street market in the centre of Newhaven . Sussex
attributes.background:
Study advocate and back the creation of a public street market in the centre of Newhaven . The town centre is dying a slow death . I asked some local people what it needed . They said demolishing 

I am a market trader of many years .  freedom is what I have enjoyed . What I actually need is a job

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local markets are a matter for the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
